about_the_game:
A Social Sim + Turn-Based RPG with a 3rd grade protagonist! 📆PLAN your days, 🧑‍🤝‍🧑BEFRIEND characters, 🧱COLLECT+CRAFT unique attacks, and ⚔️FIGHT in Turn-based combat with Action Commands!

Face Your Nightmares!


- Weird recurring nightmares are showing up all over!
- Solve the mystery of who or what is causing chaos!
- Each nightmare has different enemies representing the dreamer's darkest fears.
- Defeat them in Turn-Based Combat with Action Commands!
- Time your attacks well enough, and deal bonus damage!

Collect Toys, Create Skills!


Take your toys to use as weapons in the dream world!
- Find, earn, and trade different toys to get stronger!
- Craft your own Plastik Sword with unique skills to use in battle.
- Do you want an attack that's cheap and reliable? Or how about that will end quickly end a battle? It's your choice!

Hang out with friends!


Overcome your shyness and make friends with your classmates, parents, or unlikely strangers!
- Play in all kinds of different places and in different ways!
- Each of your friends give you different rewards
- Create different combat builds based on their rewards!

Play your days carefully!


- You only have a limited number of days to meet your deadlines.
- While hanging out with friends will help, there are imminent threats to face that won't wait for you.

name: Racecar Bed

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Non-integrated graphics card
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
